No comments yet? I have one, it is easier sometimes to calculate the ratio of squares as the ratio of their sides to the power of 2, so a^2/b^2 =  (a/b)^2, so 30^2/15^2 = (30/15)^2 = (2)^2 = 4; goes a lot faster than 30^2/15^=900/225=4

Ocean wave, means deep water. In this case cg = sqrt(gL/2pi) = sqrt(9.81*200/2pi)   E = (1/16)rho*g*(2A)^2 E = (1/6)(1000)(9.81)(4)  P = E*cg P = 173.35 kW/m
